method.name: POST
method.doc: To install an extension with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the extensions URI.

request.doc:
POST https://{appliance_hostname}/extensions/inspect
POST_DATA: { "extension_support_package": "file.ext", "type":"application/octet-stream" }
curl https://{appliance_hostname}/extensions/inspect -u admin:password --form file=@extension_package.ext -X POST ( POST https://{appliance_hostname}/extensions/activate
POST_DATA: { "extension_support_package": "file.ext" (as an application/octet-stream),

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: extension_support_package
param.doc: The name of the extension support package to install (as an application/octet-stream).

param.name: third_party_package
param.doc: The name of the third party package to install (as an application/octet-stream).

param.name: config_data
param.doc: Configuration data related to the extension (as multipart/form-data)
